arts.ttl: Aston Villa vs Bournemouth – Match Preview and Team News
arts.sum: Aston Villa host Bournemouth in an intriguing Premier League clash on Sunday, as two of the season’s over-performers go head-to-head. Both sides are looking to bounce back from league defeats last weekend. Unai Emery’s side, however, will be buoyed by a 2-0 Europa League victory in midweek. Meanwhile, a well-rested Bournemouth side arrive on the […] The post Aston Villa vs Bournemouth – Match Preview and Team News first appeared on The Football Faithful.
